title: Microphone for Messages app?
content:
There is no microphone icon on the keyboard of my Messages app.  How can I add one so that I can use voice to compose texts?  

My 4 XL is new; I'm exploring set-up, options, ... wanting to configure in the simplest way and then add features as I need them.  I have the number row showing on the keyboard and it's set to show large.  Yes, there's a microphone showing on the Messages+ keyboard and I can switch.

Also, is there an alternate text app that shows a few lines of the message?

I'm liking the phone a lot so far, especially the large size - easier for me to hold.

Sylvia
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
